mapper.select: select * from Mento inner join MentoProcess on Mento.UserID=MentoProcess.MentoID where MentoProcess.Process='0'
mapper.update: update MentoProcess set Process=#{Process} where ProcessID=#{processID}
update Mento set CompanyName=#{CompanyName}, UnivName=#{UnivName}, CertificationName=#{CertificationName} where MentoID=#{MentoID}
update Users set Role=#{Role} where UserID=#{UserID}
